title: DDFP 598: Week 2 Red Challenge Flag Picks
itunes:title: DDFP 598: Week 2 Red Challenge Flag Picks
description:
Dave Dameshek is joined by Handsome Hank, Matt Harmon and Matt "Franchise" Franciscovich to discuss their earliest football memories, update the classic, yet outdated '85 Bears reference and weigh in on some Week 2 fantasy advice. Then, EmmaVP reads her Week 2 "TV Guide" descriptions for the biggest matchups of the week for the fellas to then preview and make their picks. Plus, Sideline Savy catches up with LaMarr Woodley to discuss his involvement in NFL Network's Tackle My Ride series.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
